articles.content: Four years after the COVID-19 pandemic began, SARS-CoV2 remains a threat to the health of primary immunodeficiency patients. And though PI patients long to return to regular life without having to ca… [+3522 chars]

articles.title: QC clinic sees significant rise in illness during holiday season - WQAD News 8
articles.description: Amana Care Clinic in Davenport discusses the spike in illness during the holiday season, and how families and friends can remain vigilant during the holiday ...
